text: Lethal Weapon 2 is a 1989 American buddy cop action comedy movie directed by Richard Donner, and starring Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Joe Pesci, Patsy Kensit, Derrick O'Connor and Joss Ackland. It is a sequel to the 1987 movie Lethal Weapon and the second movie in the Lethal Weapon series. ==Cast== == Other websites == * Category:1989 action movies Category:1989 crime movies Category:1989 thriller movies Category:1980s buddy movies Category:1980s crime thriller movies Category:American action movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:Buddy cop movies Category:Movies about drugs Category:Movies about terrorism Category:Movies about revenge Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Donner
title: Lethal Weapon 2
